content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'xtraverse': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a groove oriented primarily in the vertical direction, from bottom to top of the image. The red circle indicates the user's gaze near the top-center of the groove.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 250, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
